Class JsonGameDataLoader

java.lang.Object
com.jeopardy.service.JsonGameDataLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameDataLoader
public class JsonGameDataLoader extends Object implements GameDataLoader
Loads Jeopardy-style game data from a JSON file.

Expected structure (array of question objects): 

[
  {
    "Category": "Science",
    "Value": 100,
    "Question": "What is H2O?",
    "Options": {
      "A": "Water",
      "B": "Oxygen",
      "C": "Hydrogen",
      "D": "Helium"
    },
    "CorrectAnswer": "A"
  },
  ...
]

Each object represents one fully-defined multiple-choice question. After loading all items, the resulting categories are validated via DataValidator.

  • Method Details

    • load

      public GameData load(Path filePath) throws IOException
      Loads game data from a JSON file at the given path.

      Validation performed:

      • File existence and non-empty content
      • Valid JSON structure
      • Presence and correctness of all required fields: Category, Value, Question, Options(Aâ€“D), CorrectAnswer
      • CorrectAnswer must be one of A, B, C, or D
      Specified by:
      load in interface GameDataLoader
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the JSON file
      Returns:
      populated GameData instance
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is missing, malformed, or violates schema
